title: Ripley's Times Square Halloween Party!
text:
Ripley's Times Square Halloween Party! The best Halloween party in New York City is back again! ET | Source: Ripley's Believe It or Not! Times Square photo-release 
NEW YORK, Sept. 30,   For one night only Ripley's Believe It or Not! Times Square is transforming in to the most horrifying attraction around, and is summoning all spirits, ghouls and twisted souls to its Second Annual Halloween Party on Saturday, October 31, 2015 . 
Denizens from the Ripley's crypt will manifest at this macabre annual Halloween celebration to share their tales of the horrid and bizarre. You've seen haunted houses. Now… you can party in one with multiple open bars, devilishly delicious food, dancing and of course…. candy! There will be plenty of games, prizes and ghastly entertainment so wear your costumes and bring your spare brains. 
The night will include special guest appearances, a twisted game show, psychic readings, a hypnotist, a Day of the Dead candy celebration and so much more! Check our website for the latest event updates and details. 
Get you tickets now because the "number of heads" for this cadaverous event is extremely limited! The Poison Punch starts flowing at 8PM and dries up atmidnight; our doors open at 7:30PM and dancing lasts until 1am. 
Attendees must be 21 years of age or older. 
Tickets are available at www.ripleysnewyork.com while supplies last. 
About Ripley's Believe It or Not! Times Square 
Located in the heart of New York City, Ripley's Believe It or Not! Times Square brings people of all ages face-to-face with the world's most unbelievable curiosities. As you meander through 20+ themed galleries spanning two floors, you'll discover new surprises around every turn. Make sure you bring your camera - there are amazing photo opportunities you won't find anywhere else! Ripley's Believe It or Not! Times Square is open 365 days a year; 9:00am – 1:00am. 
Last admission sold one hour prior to closing. Seasonal hours my differ; please check www.RipleysNewYork.com for further information and updates.
